H0.text: What is the name of the new town on the outskirts of Paris which is the site of 'Euro Disney', opened in 1992. Val d'Europe

H1.text: What is the name of the new town on the outskirts of Paris which is the site of 'Euro Disney', opened in 1992. Serris

H2.text: What is the name of the new town on the outskirts of Paris which is the site of 'Euro Disney', opened in 1992. Coupvray

H3.text: What is the name of the new town on the outskirts of Paris which is the site of 'Euro Disney', opened in 1992. Marne-la-Vallée

A4.text: Disneyland Paris, Walt Disney Studios Park, Val d'Europe, Université Paris-Est Marne-la-Vallée, ESIEE Paris, and École des Ponts ParisTech are located in Marne-la-Vallée.

A5.text: Marne-la-Vallée is a new town located near the city centre of Paris, France.
